attributes.action: Ensure that any public vote on TV programs is final and binding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people enjoy watching TV programs where they can vote who stays and who goes.
However it is apparent that in some show that judges marks are biased towards certain performers.
Therefore in future the judges should score the performance, but that the performer rejected is to be selected purely on the audience vote.
It should not be that the judges get a chance to "save" a performer.
Neither should the Programs be permitted to reintroduce new contestants during a show, or to bring back those rejected by the public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
